posts.post_content:
I have the following 2 cards for trade.  

Looking for any T216's I don't own, with any of the backs (Kotton, Virginia Extra, and MINO).  

If interested in trading, email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

These are only available for trade.

T206 Ty Cobb (red portrait) w/Carolina Brights back PSA 1 (paperloss on back)

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/My%2020/1909E95MathewsonChristyPhilaCaramel.jpg[/IMG]
